tutorial_question1: How to Log into the System?
tutorial_answer_text1: To log into the system, enter the username and password provided during registration.
tutorial_question2: How to Create a New Booking?
tutorial_answer_text2: To create a new booking, click on the "New Booking" button and fill in the customer and booking details.
tutorial_answer_text3: To manage the occupancy calendar, you can view and edit your business availability through the main dashboard.
